title: How has the way people use the internet changed over the years?

korean: 인터넷 사용 방식이 정말 많이 변한 것 같아.
예전엔 주로 컴퓨터로 인터넷을 했는데, 요즘은 거의 다 스마트폰으로 해.
언제 어디서나 인터넷에 접속할 수 있게 됐어.
예전엔 싸이월드나 미니홈피 같은 게 유행이었는데, 지금은 인스타그램이나 유튜브가 대세야.
콘텐츠 형식도 바뀌어서 텍스트보다 이미지랑 영상 위주로 변했어.
특히 짧은 영상 콘텐츠가 정말 인기 많아졌어.
쇼핑도 온라인으로 하는 사람들이 엄청 늘었어.
배달 앱도 일상화되고, 온라인 결제도 당연해졌어.
화상 회의나 재택근무도 많이 늘면서 인터넷 활용도가 높아졌어.
정보 검색 방식도 달라져서 요즘엔 AI 챗봇 같은 것도 많이 써.
english: The way people use the internet seems to have, like, really changed a lot.
Before, we mainly used the internet on computers, but these days almost everyone uses smartphones.
We can now access the internet anytime, anywhere.
Before, things like Cyworld or mini-homepages were popular, but now Instagram or YouTube are mainstream.
The content format has also changed to, you know, focus more on images and videos than text.
Especially short video content has become really popular.
The number of people shopping online has also increased tremendously.
Delivery apps have become part of daily life, and online payment has become natural.
As video conferencing and remote work have increased, internet usage has also grown.
The way of searching for information has also changed, so these days people use things like AI chatbots a lot.
It seems it will continue to change in the future.
